name: Ultimate Job Search Kanban
description: The Ultimate job search kanban trello template
author: David A. Lindahl <me@davidalindahl.com>

scripts.build: tailwind build ./src/layouts/index.tailwind.css -c ./tailwind.js -o ./src/layouts/index.css && purgecss -c purgecss.config.js -o ./src/layouts && gatsby build
